channel.title: [Class suggestion] Architect/Carpenter
channel.description:
Architect - Blue Dragon Support Passives: Engineered - If you die your enhancements will remain
Day Ability: Vigilante - Anyone that gets blocked by your enhancements tonight will have their name revealed to thier target. (2 uses)
Night Ability 1: Sentry - Enhance Target player and give them night Immunity until you select someone else. (4 uses) Night Ability 2: Tripwire - Enhance target player and give them Tamper (frame, mind warp, ect) and Occupy Immunity until you target someone else. (4 uses)
Carpenter - Unseen Support
Day Ability: Pettibone - If Target player has Occupy Immunity then remove it. If he doesn't then give him Occupy Immunity. (3 uses)
Night Ability 1: Faux Brace - Target player will think they were attacked but immune. (2 uses) Night Ability 2: Destabilize - Perminatly remove night and Occupy Immunity from Target player. (1 use)
Inspired by @Tormental's Babysitter. I'm sorry I keep pinging you I just think that the wacky class ideas are the best part of CC!

item.title: [Class suggestion] Architect/Carpenter
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Thanks. I added all of those. It looks much better now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Architect/Carpenter
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Okay, less stupid names coming:

Impressive Nomenclature Below

Built to Last -------> Engineer

Trap Door -------> Vigilant

Alarm System ---------> Sentry

Unavailability Indicator -----> (I have no idea what this ability does based on your description so I’ll hold off until later)

Locksmithy ------> Pettibone (A forklift used by carpenters to move heavy stuff around, occupy immunity should be immovable without this)

False Alarm --------> Faux Brace (A brace is used to stabilize builds and stuff)

Sabotage -------> Destabilize

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Architect/Carpenter
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
This is true… Gimme a sec.

Fixed. No longer gives conversation Immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Architect/Carpenter
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
my fear there is too many things to give conversion immunity (unless this is replacing CW). I really am nervious of returning to the days where making it to night 4 without a single succesful conversion being commonplace. Having up to 4 conversion preventers in play at a time… may be pretty bad for that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Architect/Carpenter
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Oh and if anyone has ideas for some less stupid Ability names then I want to hear it.

Read full topic
